tuv.seg: Cash income not included in the means test
Ioncam airgid thirim nach n-áirítear sa tástáil mhaoine
If you are applying for a social assistance payment you must satisfy a means test
Ní mór duit tástáil acmhainne a chomhlíonadh chun iarratas a dhéanamh ar íocaíocht leasa shóisialaigh
All your sources of income (for example, cash income, employment, capital and maintenance) are assessed in a means test by the Department of Social Protection (DSP)
Tá do foinsí ioncaim go léir (mar shampla, ioncam (airgead tirim, fostaiocht, caipiteal agus cothabháil) measúnaithe ag an Roinn Coimirce Sóisialaí
However, under social welfare legislation certain items are not counted when your means are assessed for a social assistance payment
De réir reachtaíocht Leasa Shóisialaigh, áfach, ní chomhairtear rudaí áirithe agus measúnú á dhéanamh ar d'acmhainn le haghaidh íocaíocht leasa shóisialaigh
This document looks at cash income not included in the means test
Mínionn an doiciméad seo ioncam (airgead tirim) a n-áirítear sa tástáil acmhainne amháin
More information on income not taken into account is available in our document on the means test
Tá tuilleadh eolais ar fáil sa doiciméad maidir leis an tástáil acmhainne

The following cash income is not taken into account for all schemes except Family Income Supplement (FIS), Supplementary Welfare Allowance (SWA) and Rent Allowance (Rent Allowance is not the same as Rent Supplement):

Seo a leanas an ioncam nach n-áirítear sa tástáil acmhainne do na scéimeanna uile seachas Forlíonadh ar Ioncam Teaghlaigh (FIT), Liúntas Leasa Forlíontach agus Liúntas Cíosa (Ní hionann Liúntas Cíosa agus Forlíonadh Cíosa):
• Any payment made by the Department of Social Protection (DSP) (except in the case of Jobseeker's Allowance where a maximum payment applies)
• Aon íocaíocht a dhéanann an Roinn Coimirce Sóisialaí (DSP) (seachas i gcás Liúntas Cuardaitheora Poist ina mbíonn íocaíocht uasta i gceist)
• Income from property already assessed on its capital value
• Íocaíocht ar bith ó Bhallstát AE eile atá comhfhreagrach le Sochar Linbh
• Any payment corresponding to Child Benefit from another EU member state
• Ioncam ó eagraíochtaí carthanachta neamh-bhrabúis aitheanta
• Income from recognised non-profit making charitable organisations
• Liúntas Soghluaiseachta ón Feidhmeannacht na Seirbhíse Sláinte (FSS)
• Mobility Allowance from the Health Service Executive (HSE)
• Liúntas cúram altrama ón FSS
• Home Care Grant from the HSE
• Deontas Cúram Baile ón FSS
• Allowances under the Home Tuition Scheme from the Department of Education and Skills
• Liúntais le haghaidh Cláir Teagaisc Bhaile ón Roinn Oideachais agus Scileanna
• Grants to parents of children attending primary school in Gaeltacht areas, and income from providing accommodation to students studying Irish in Gaeltacht areas

• Deontais do thuismitheoirí a bhfuil a leanaí ag freastal ar bhunscoil i gceantair Gaeltachta, mar aon le hioncam ó lóistín a chur ar fáil do mhic léinn a dhéanann staidéar ar an nGaeilge i gceantair Gaeltachta
• Any amount received as a training allowance while undergoing a course of rehabilitation training by an organisation approved by the Minister for Health
• Suim airgid ar bith a fhaigheann daoine mar liúntas oiliúna le linn dóibh a bheith ar chúrsa oiliúna athshlánaithe faoi stiúir eagraíochta atá formheasta ag an Aire Sláinte
• Compensation awards to people who have contracted Hepatitis C or HIV from contaminated blood products, together with income from the investment of that money
• Íocaíochtaí cúitimh do dhaoine a bhfuil Heipitíteas C nó VEID tolgtha acu ó thairgí fola fabhtacha, mar aon le hioncam ó infheistíochtaí an airgid sin
• Compensation awards by way of the Residential Institutions Redress Board together with income from the investment of that money
• Íocaíochtaí cúitimh ón mBord um Shásamh i leith Foras Cónaithe, mar aon le hioncam ó infheistíochtaí an airgid sin
• Compensation awards to persons who have a disability caused by Thalidomide together with income from the investment of that money
• Íocaíochtaí cúitimh do dhaoine a bhfuil míchumas orthu de thoradh Tailídimíde mar aon le hioncam ó infheistíochtaí an airgid sin
• €104 per year from certain Army pensions (including a British War Pension)
• €104 in aghaidh na bliana ó Arm-phinsin áirithe. Áirítear Pinsean Arm na Breataine sa liosta seo

• The following payments to your spouse, civil partner or cohabitant: Back to Work Enterprise Allowance, Back to Education Allowance, Back to Work Allowance or Part-Time Job Incentive, FET or VTOS payments
• Aon aisíocaíochtaí a rinneadh faoin Scéim Aisíocaíochta Teach Altranais le céile nó le páirtnéir sibhialta an duine ar gearradh táillí iomarcacha orthu

In addition payments which have been determined in accordance with the Magdalen Commission Report for the benefit of women who were admitted to and worked in the Magdalen Laundries, and payments awarded by the Residential Institutions Statutory Fund Board are not taken into account for all schemes, Family Income Supplement, Supplementary Welfare Allowance and Rent Allowance

• Na híocaíochtaí a leanas le do chéile, páirtnéir sibhialta nó do chomháitritheoir: Liúntas Fiontraíochta um Fhilleadh ar Obair, Liúntas um Fhilleadh ar Oideachas, Liúntas um Fhilleadh ar Obair nó Dreasacht Phoist Pháirtaimseartha, íocaíochtaí ó FÁS nó ón Scéim Deiseanna Oiliúna Gairmoideachais (VTOS) (gan Fostaíocht Pobail a áireamh)
Additional cash income may not be taken into account for individual social welfare payments
Ní fhéadtar aon ioncam breise airgid thirim a chur san áireamh le haghaidh íocaíochtaí aonair leasa shóisialaigh
The Department of Social Protection provides more information on additional cash income not taken into account in the means test for social welfare payments
Cuireann an Roinn Coimirce Sóisialaí tuilleadh faisnéise ar fáil faoi ioncam breise airgid nach gcuirtear san áireamh sa tástáil mhaoine le haghaidh íocaíochtaí leasa shóisialaigh
